item.title: Totally Mixed Up Episode vol. 2
item.description:
Totally Mixed Up Episode vol. 2

Totally Mixed Up Episode vol. 2

That's right, Beat Transfer is back! After a hiatus of over a year, the Beat Transfer Service Podcast returns with quality selections from the drum and bass and hip hop universe. The Totally Mixed Up Episode vol. 2 is full of music and sparse on the talkie this time around, with releases spanning from 2008 to 2009. This mix has been optimized with full bass pressure, for optimal playback! If you enjoy any or all of these tracks, please support the artist(s) and buy their music.

Enjoy the mix!

Tracklist

BTS Intro
Alaska & Paradox - Odium - Paradox Music - 2009
Break - After Shower - Shogun Audio - 2009
Spectralsoul - Buried - 31 Records - 2009
Rufige Kru - Mirror featuring D Bridge - Metalheadz - 2009
D-Kay - & Lee - Tuning (D-Kay Remix) - Razors Edge - 2009
Black Milk - Hell Yeah (ft. Fat Ray) - Fat Beats Records - 2008
Yancey Boys - DFTF feat. Affion Crockett - Delicious Vinyl - 2008
Madlib + MED feat. Poke - Rapster Records - 2008
Madvillain/Madlib Remixes - Light of the Past (Madlib Remix) - Cat. MAD003 - 2008
D-Bridge - Reverible Top (Ver 2) - Exit Records - 2008
Seba - Day By Night - Secret Operations - 2008
w/ Samples from Fanu - Silentium/Hangman's Lullaby (Fanu Remix) - Lightless Recordings - 2009
NSF - Comeback - Lightless Recordings - 2009
Bad Matter & Martsman - Cold Love - Lightless Recordings - 2008
DKay + Rawfull - Sequential Circuit - Brigand Music - 2009
Dub One - Murder Sound - Scientific Wax - 2009
Antidote & Panopticon - Peripheral Thinking - Outsider - 2008
Alaska & Paradox - Jerico - Paradox Music - 2009
Breakage - Rebel Creations - Critical - 2008

Share   Save This Page

item.title: House Echos, House Music Mix 8
item.description:
House Echos, House Music Mix 8

House Echos number 8 is here, a house music mix full of deep, melodic sounds! All my podcasts are free, promotional mixes to encourage you the listener to appreciate the music and hopefully go out and buy these sounds! The beat transfer service podcasts are made with love!

Tracklist

Gavin Boyce - To The Roxy - Nordic Trax
Karizma - Music - Rotgut Records
Jaymz Nylon ft. Kyla Sexton - Lonely (Shelter Vocal Remixed by Timmy Regisford) - Un-Restricted Access
Dennis Ferrer -Transitions (Sunshine's Backups Only Version - Tomo Edit) - King Street Sounds
Gene King ft. Sacha - Changes (Shelter Genetix Dub) - Shelter Records
Cast of Thousands ft. Mimi Johnson - Givin My Love (Marc's Tribe of Lunch Pail Mix) - Bassline Records
Telepopmusik - Love Can Damage Your Health (Abicah Soul/Dennis Ferrer Remix) - Objektivity
Grand High Priest - Feedback Remix (GHP Orgapella) - HMS Records
Kneedeep & DJ Spen ft. Bibical Jones - Gotta Have House (Do You Remember) (Kneedeep Original Mix) - Kneedeep USA
DJ Gregory - Breeze (Marlon D & George Mena's Muted Mix) - Defected
Kerri Chandler - Bar A Thym (Peace Division Soft Heavy Remix) - NRK
Kreon & Lemos - Lookooshere (Art Bleek Remix) - Resopal Red
Peven Everett - Put Your Back Into It (Peven Original Mix) - Unified
Timmy Regisford - Hard Drums (Dub Mix) - Restricted Tracks
Kimara Lovelace - These Times (Retro Fit Dub) - King Street Sounds
Ledisi - In The Morning (David Harness Vocal) - Restricted Access
Wil Milton presents Gravity Inc. - Gravity (The Gravity Soundtrack) - King Street Sounds
Kerri Chandler - Hallelujah (Kaoz Club Mix) - King Street Sounds (from Mix The Vibe Quentin Harris EP)

item.title: Retrograde vol. 1: Classic House Music
item.description:
Retrograde vol. 1: Classic House Music

The beat transfer's podcast 1st Anniversary Party!

Our love of house goes deep into the crates this episode for our 1 year anniversary podcast! This past year has been an amazing journey full of house music, hip hop, and drum and bass! With lots of "on the job" experience, even this experienced DJ has been taught a few new tricks! Already looking forward to the next year of podcasting, there are some great episodes ahead, including some fundamentals - yes, I'm talking all that jazz! As a precursor, this episode starts with some heavy funk, so tune in and get the office, or house party, or car bumpin' with some great Classic House!

Tracklist

Close Your Eyes - Caprells - Funky L.A.
??? - White Label
I'll Be Your Friend (Dead Zone) - Robert Owens - RCA
Voodoo Ray (Gerald's Rham On Acid Remix) - A Guy Called Gerald - Warlock
??? - White Label
F-U-Later (remix) - D.J. #1 - Dance Mania
You Used To Hold Me - Ralphi Rosario Presents Xaviera Gold - House Classics Promo
Think U Big Time - Johnny Loopz's Bust A Groove vol. 17 - Promo
Tell It Like It T-I-Is! (MK Underground Mix) - The B52's - Reprise
Let Your Fro Gro (Hula's Club Mix) - Bush Man - Chicago Style
Follow Me (Club Mix) - Aly-Us - Strictly Rythm
Lifetime Heads - CityStreetNJ - White Label
Who Needs Enemies - Red Light - Hi Bias
Burning 4 You - Larry Heard - Black Market
Club Lonely - Lil' Louis & The World - Epic
Video Clash (Video Crash) - Lil' Louis (Marshell Jefferson, uncredited) - Two 04 Street
Work It To The Bone (Vocal) - LNR - House Jam
20 Below - Pierre's Phantasy Club - Jack Trax
House of Love (More/Phearce Mix) - Smooth Touch - Strictly Rythm
Brighter Days (Underground Trance) - Cajmere Featuring Dajae - Cajual
Can U Feel It (Vocal) - Mr. Fingers - Trax

item.title: House Echos, House Music Mix 7
item.description:
House Echos, House Music Mix 7

The latest in the House Echos series, a mix apart - focusing in on Deep House as well as some "future retro" sounds. Whether you're just chillin', maxin' and relaxin', or getting down with your feet, we hope you enjoy this latest house music mix, over 80 minutes strong!

Tracklist

Dub Journey - Domu - Neroli
Help Me (Messengers Mix) - Nina Simone - Promo
Imagine (Ron Trent's Afican High-Fi Mix) - Bernard Bodie feat. Olandus Gray - Smooth Agent
Second Chances - Theo Parrish with Warren Harris feat. MonicaBlaire - Sound Signature
CT. Beat Down - Jus-Ed - Underground Quality
Find The Way (Easy Tracks Vocal) - Ethan White and Lisa Shaw - Large Music
Way Back When (D-Reflection Dub Mix) - Raul Moros - Soulfuric
Kong - Kerri Chandler - Deeply Rooted House
Twisted (Got Me Goin' Round) (Louie Vega Production) (Main Mix) - Ultra Nate - Vega Records
P 2 Da J (Tiger Stripes Remix) (Tiger Stripes Dub) - Dennis Ferrer - King Street
Synthetic Flemm - Theo Parrish - Sound Signature
Deepest Desire - Eric Kupper Presents K-Scope - Nite Grooves
Force of Nature (Blaze Roots Old School Dub) - Sunshine Anderson - Blaze Imprints
Soft Cell - Glenn Underground - Mood & Grooves
Galactic Ancestors - Theo Parrish - Sound Signature
Dangerous - Murray Richardson - 2020 Vision

item.title: Old School Hip Hop Episode
item.description:
Old School Hip Hop Episode

Leaping into the Old School Hip Hop Epsisode, complete with static, pops, and scratches. In the intro I joke about how I feel, then get right down to business!
Enjoy the mix!

item.title: Totally Mixed Up Episode vol. 1
item.description:
Totally Mixed Up Episode vol. 1

Totally Mixed Up Episode vol. 1

Taking things in a different direction this episode, a mixture of sounds and new format, hence the title, "Totally Mixed Up". This mix is representive of how I like to play, going back and forth from drum and bass to hip hop selections. I also chose to forego the usual talkie intro for adlib tracklisting call outs, live and direct! I also used part of an original sound, a work in progress, which starts out the show (it peaks a little, but sets the mood).

Enjoy!

Tracklist

Beat Transfer - Untitled Sound (Working Edit - Mind the Peaks!)
Dillinja - Angels Fell - Metalheadz (Repress)
Dom & Roland - Deckards Theme - DRP
Seba & Paradox - Remembrance - Special Operations
Quasimodo - Fatbacks - Stones Throw
Photek - One Nation - Sanctuary
Calibre - Stcal Roller - Signature
Saburuko - Latency - Horizons Music
Breakage - Hindsight - Bassbin
Seba - Warriors - Special Operations
Ghostface Killah feat. Reakwon and Method Man - Yolanda's House - Def Jam
Saukrates - Action (Raw Mix) - Capitol Hill
Paradox - Skull Minded - Outsider
Atlantic Connection - Dimension X - Celsius
Nucleus + Paradox - Cabalistic - Esoteric
Sabre - Velvet Lawn - Scientific Wax
Talib Kweli - Who Got It (Dirty) - Koch
MF Doom - Vomitspit - Rhymesayers
Madlib Remixes - No Label Records
Mack 10 - Dopeman - Priority (N.W.A. Anniversary Edition)
John Legend - Refuge (When It's Cold Outside) - Columbia

item.title: House Echos, House Music Mix 6
item.description:
House Echos, House Music Mix 6

House Echos, House Music Mix 6

The latest house echos mix is here! House Echos, House Music Mix 6 takes you on a ride with true deep house flava, we are ending the year with real House Music, for your ears and butts to groove with! Happy New Year to all, see you in '08 with more great slammin' music!

Tracklist

BTS Talkie Intro with Byron Stingily Presents LeJuan - Piece of Meat (RC's bmc Emotion Inst) - King Street 2007
Blue Boy - Dub-A-Dutch - Guidance 2000
Nick Holder ft. Sacha - Time (Original Mix) - NRK 2007
Pound Boys - Way Back When - Look At You 1998
Pevin Everett - Easy livin' (Lava Mix) - Unified 2005

Mutabaruka - Dis Poem '99 (Reel Houze - Da Rub) - Guidance 1999

Malik Alston - Hot - Truth Manifest 2007

item.title: BTS Hip Hop Episode Mix 2
item.description:
BTS Hip Hop Episode Mix 2

Beat Transfer Service Presents
BTS Hip Hop Episode Mix 2

item.title: Exclusive House Mix on Orbital Grooves 10/01/07
item.description:
Exclusive House Mix on Orbital Grooves 10/01/07

This is my house music mix from DJ Shane Smith's Show, on Orbital Grooves Radio. It originally aired on 10/01/2007 and was recorded previously, exclusively for the show. It runs for about 75 minutes total. Enjoy it, it is one of my favorite recorded house mixes, if it gets me bumpin', then you are sure to be dancing in your seat, if you can remain seated, be prepared to be taken on a journey, care of beat transfer service!

Tracklist

Greg Greene - Untitled (from Mood Ring E.P.) - Aquarius Recordings
Stacy Kidd - Soul Funk - Dust Traxx Recordings
Mateo Murphy - Cascade (Remix) - Haute Couture Records
Solid Gold Playaz - Solid Gold Playa - Solid Gold Records
Full Swing - Freestyle (Choices Vocal Mix) - Groove On Music
Version 5.0 - Love is Blind - DNH Records
Abacus - Untitled (from Collectors Edition 12") - Prescription
Lectroluv - The Difference (Deeply Different) - Eight Ball Records
Byron Wallen - Winds of Change/Earth Roots (Black Science Byron Beats Mix) - M.E.L.T. 2000
Jerome - Predetermined - Music Man
Paperclip People - Throw - Planet E
The Architect - Loop 1 - Tuning Fork
Solid Gold Playaz - Pimpin Ken's Theme - Solid Gold Records
DJ Tony V feat. Yahsha - keep Jumpin' - Perfect Pair Music
Milk & Sugar - Higher & Higher (Tom Novy & Pluto remix) - Popular Records
Rennie 'Dubnut" Foster Presents The Chocolate Factory - Chocolate (Victorian Jazz Mix) - Phatt phunk Records
Dizzy W 2nd - Blue M.
Jon Silva - Run Out Of Time - Plastic City
Alex Gopher - The Child (Romanthony Mix) - Solid


web.url http://beattransferservice.com

DJ Shane Smith - http://www.djshanesmith.com/
OGR - http://www.orbitalgrooves.com/

item.itunes:summary:
Exclusive House Mix on Orbital Grooves 10/01/07 This is my house music mix from DJ Shane Smith's Show, on Orbital Grooves Radio. It originally aired on 10/01/2007 and was recorded previously, exclusively for the show. It runs for about 75 minutes total. Enjoy it, it is one of my favorite recorded house mixes, if it gets me bumpin', then you are sure to be dancing in your seat, if you can remain seated, be prepared to be taken on a journey, care of beat transfer service!
Tracklist
Greg Greene - Untitled (from Mood Ring E.P.) - Aquarius Recordings Stacy Kidd - Soul Funk - Dust Traxx Recordings Mateo Murphy - Cascade (Remix) - Haute Couture Records Solid Gold Playaz - Solid Gold Playa - Solid Gold Records Full Swing - Freestyle (Choices Vocal Mix) - Groove On Music Version 5.0 - Love is Blind - DNH Records Abacus - Untitled (from Collectors Edition 12") - Prescription Lectroluv - The Difference (Deeply Different) - Eight Ball Records Byron Wallen - Winds of Change/Earth Roots (Black Science Byron Beats Mix) - M.E.L.T. 2000 Jerome - Predetermined - Music Man Paperclip People - Throw - Planet E The Architect - Loop 1 - Tuning Fork Solid Gold Playaz - Pimpin Ken's Theme - Solid Gold Records DJ Tony V feat. Yahsha - keep Jumpin' - Perfect Pair Music Milk & Sugar - Higher & Higher (Tom Novy & Pluto remix) - Popular Records Rennie 'Dubnut" Foster Presents The Chocolate Factory - Chocolate (Victorian Jazz Mix) - Phatt phunk Records Dizzy W 2nd - Blue M. Jon Silva - Run Out Of Time - Plastic City Alex Gopher - The Child (Romanthony Mix) - Solid
web.url http://beattransferservice.com
DJ Shane Smith - http://www.djshanesmith.com/ OGR - http://www.orbitalgrooves.com/

item.title: The Drum and Bass Episode
item.description:
The Drum and Bass Episode

The Drum and Bass Episode

Lots of new and recent music and it's all Drum and Bass! over 80 minutes of Drumfunk, Dark, and Hard ish for your listening pleasure! Enjoy!

item.description:
BTS Hip Hop Episode Mix 1

Hip Hop Episode Mix #1

The long awaited Hip Hop episode is finaly here! In true Hip Hop form, this mix spans the decades of different styles of music. Hope you like it!

A Tribe Called Quest - Busta's Lament

item.title: House Echos, House Music Mix 1
item.description:
House Echos, House Music Mix 1

This is a 17 minute House Music sample clip, from the archives, edited for time. This excerpt represents one night, a couple of gemini DD20's and a good feeling. For more info visit myspace.com/beattransferservice

Tracklist

New York - S.O.H.O. - Give It Up (Passion Mix)
Vince Ailey Presents Bachelor Apt. - Ogga La Musica
E-Troneek Funk - Oino (Or Next Intro)
Ballistic Brothers - Future James (Bubble) vs. Fingers Inc. - A Path (Accapella Beats)
Zack Toms - Theme (Deep Cuts)
Houz' Neegroz - How Do You Love A Black Woman?
Digible Planets - 9th Wonder (Summer)
